Detailed Description

SmsUnsentProvider is the provider to retrieve the unsent sms from the sim. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_sms_unsent_provider_id

Please refer to SmsProvider for possible columns

After sending the sms ToogleRow must be called and the state of the sms will be set to sent. The sms will then appear in the SmsSentProvider and disappear in SmsUnsentProvider.

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
